TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OpenTelemetryChatClient extends Microsoft.Extensions.AI.DelegatingChatClient
Public NotInheritable Class OpenTelemetryChatClient Inherits DelegatingChatClient

Docs.summary: A delegating chat client that implements the OpenTelemetry Semantic Conventions for Generative AI systems.
Docs.remarks: The draft specification this follows is available at https://opentelemetry.io/docs/specs/semconv/gen-ai/. The specification is still experimental and subject to change; as such, the telemetry output by this client is also subject to change.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether potentially sensitive information should be included in telemetry.
Docs.remarks: The value is by default, meaning that telemetry will include metadata such as token counts but not raw inputs and outputs such as message content, function call arguments, and function call results.
